FuncDef:
The lacp backup-mode enable command enables an Eth-Trunk interface to work in static LACP master/backup negotiation mode.
The undo lacp backup-mode enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, an Eth-Trunk interface is not enabled to work in static LACP master/backup negotiation mode.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If not all interfaces to be added to an Eth-Trunk interface in static LACP mode reside on the same traffic manager (TM) but you want those on the same TM to negotiate first, run the lacp backup-mode enable command to enable the Eth-Trunk interface to work in static LACP master/backup negotiation mode and then run the lacp port-role master command to set the master role for each interface on the same TM. These interfaces then negotiate first.
Prerequisites
An Eth-Trunk interface has been configured to work in static LACP mode using the mode lacp-static command in the Eth-Trunk interface view.The Eth-Trunk interface does not contain any member interface.
